table_description: Cloudflare Firewall Rules is a flexible and intuitive framework for filtering HTTP requests.

columns.name: paused
columns.description: Indicates whether the firewall rule is currently paused.

columns.name: priority
columns.description: The priority of the rule to allow control of processing order. A lower number indicates high priority. If not provided, any rules with a priority will be sequenced before those without.

columns.name: action
columns.description: The action to apply to a matched request.

columns.name: created_on
columns.description: The time when the firewall rule is created.

columns.name: description
columns.description: A description of the rule to help identify it.

columns.name: modified_on
columns.description: The time when the firewall rule is updated.

columns.name: products
columns.description: A list of products to bypass for a request when the bypass action is used.
